deathly_chill.name: Deathly Chill
deathly_chill.desc: Gain Ice damage, multiplied by 2 ^ weapon tier.

deaths_grasp.name: Active: Death's Grasp
deaths_grasp.desc:
For 6 seconds, all of your damage 
is Marking. At the end of the 
duration, 40.0% of Marked damage 
is repeated.

Cooldown: 50 Seconds
Duration: 6 Seconds
Cost: 35 Mana

This skill can be activated after unlock by pressing your swap key. (F by default)

scythe_mastery.name: Scythe Mastery
scythe_mastery.desc: Gain an additional chance to cleave while wielding a scythe.

dash.name: Active: Dash
dash.desc:
Dash a short distance in the 
direction you are moving.

Cooldown: 7 Seconds
Range: 4
Cost: 20 Mana

This skill can be activated after unlock
by pressing your drop key. (Q by
default)

soul_harvest.name: Soul Harvest
soul_harvest.desc:
Killing an enemy increases your 
damage for 8 seconds.

frost_nova.name: Skill Modifier: Frost Nova
frost_nova.desc:
Briefly slow enemies in a 4 block
radius before dashing, and gain 15
Cleave for 5 seconds.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

cull_the_weak.name: Cull The Weak
cull_the_weak.desc:
Increased damage to slowed targets
by a percentage.

leach.name: Leach
leach.desc:
Gain lifesteal for 5 seconds after
killing an enemy.

numb.name: Numb
numb.desc:
Ignore a percentage of enemy thorns
 and reflect.

mirrored_warding.name: Mirrored Warding
mirrored_warding.desc: Gain a passive chance to reflect.

undying.name: Undying
undying.desc:
Gain damage reduction while below
50% of your max health.

bloodied_frenzy.name: Skill Modifier: Bloodied Frenzy
bloodied_frenzy.desc:
Death's Grasp deals 0.75% more
damage per percent of your missing
health.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

blood_transfusion.name: Blood Transfusion
blood_transfusion.desc:
Gain HP Recovery while below 50% of
your max health.

death_rites.name: Death Rites
death_rites.desc:
Killing an enemy has a chance to
 reduce the cooldown of your skill
 by 5 seconds.

necrotic_invigoration.name: Necrotic Invigoration
necrotic_invigoration.desc:
Gain a percentage increase to your
Energy Regen while below 50%
health.

binding.name: Skill Modifier: Binding
binding.desc:
At the end of Death's Grasp, apply
Slowness and Glowing to all Marked
enemies for 8 seconds.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

draining.name: Draining
draining.desc:
Gain a chance to absorb energy from
your attackers.

phylactery.name: Phylactery
phylactery.desc:
Upon PvE death, your durability
loss is reduced by a percentage.

putrid_proliferation.name: Putrid Proliferation
putrid_proliferation.desc:
Gain an additional chance to cleave
against enemies that are not
slowed.

arcane_literacy.name: Arcane Literacy
arcane_literacy.desc:
The duration of teleportation
channeling is reduced by a
percentage.

slicing_blows.name: Slicing Blows
slicing_blows.desc:
Gain a passive chance to execute
enemies that are slowed.

arcane_obscurity.name: Arcane Obscurity
arcane_obscurity.desc:
Gain Reflect and Thorns while below
50% of your max health.

empowered_cleave.name: Skill Modifier: Empowered Cleave
empowered_cleave.desc:
During Death's Grasp, cleave bonus
damage is increased from 50% to
100%, and cleave slow chance is
increased from 30% to 100%.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

desecration.name: Desecration
desecration.desc:
Your attacks have a chance to cause
 bleeding on players.

blood_rites.name: Blood Rites
blood_rites.desc:
Killing an enemy restores a
percentage of your missing health.

sapping.name: Sapping
sapping.desc:
A percentage of your lifesteal is
added as additional damage.

blood_siphon.name: Skill Modifier: Blood Siphon
blood_siphon.desc:
At the end of Death's Grasp, half
of the repeated Marked damage is
restored as health.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

the_fast.name: Active: The Fast
the_fast.desc:
Gain speed 2, jump boost 2, and 15%
increased Energy and Mana
regeneration rate for 8 seconds.
Reset start-of-combat bonuses.

Cooldown: 45 Seconds
Duration: 8 Seconds
Cost: 35 Mana

This skill can be activated after unlock
by pressing your swap key. (F by
default)

sword_mastery.name: Sword Mastery
sword_mastery.desc:
Gain an additional chance to
execute while wielding a sword.

toxic_steel.name: Toxic Steel
toxic_steel.desc:
Gain Poison damage, multiplied by 2
^ weapon tier.

leeching_poison.name: Leeching Poison
leeching_poison.desc:
A portion of outgoing Poison Damage
is gained as health. An equal
portion of your elemental damage
is converted to Poison damage.

ghost_shroud.name: Skill Modifier: Ghost Shroud
ghost_shroud.desc:
Briefly vanish upon dashing,
gaining 10% increased damage vs
monsters for 3 seconds.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

grave_robber.name: Grave Robber
grave_robber.desc: Gain a flat amount of item find.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.desc:
If you have less max health than
your attacker, gain additional
dodge.

shadowmeld.name: Shadowmeld
shadowmeld.desc: Your combat timer is reduced by a percentage.

band_of_thieves.name: Band of Thieves
band_of_thieves.desc:
Your damage and resistance against
players is increased by a
percentage.

vicious.name: Vicious
vicious.desc:
The damage of your critical strikes
is scaled by a percentage.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.desc:
You gain additional DPS for the
first 4 seconds of combat.

combo_strike.name: Skill Modifier: Combo Strike
combo_strike.desc:
During The Fast, gain 5% DPS for
each consecutive hit, up to a
maximum of 50%.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

potency.name: Potency
potency.desc:
Deal increased damage to poisoned
enemies.

first_strike.name: First Strike
first_strike.desc:
You gain an additional chance to
critically strike for the first 4
 seconds of combat.

feather_falling.name: Feather Falling
feather_falling.desc:
Your fall damage is reduced by a
percentage.

executioner.name: Skill Modifier: Executioner
executioner.desc:
Gain a 15% chance to Execute for
the duration of The Fast.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

greedy.name: Greedy
greedy.desc:
Increase the chance to loot gems
from mob kills.

swift.name: Swift
swift.desc:
Gain additional dodge that stacks
with your armor's dodge.

precision.name: Precision
precision.desc:
Gain additional accuracy, and half
of the accuracy you have now also acts as piercing.

its_just_my_nature.name: It's Just My Nature
its_just_my_nature.desc:
Increases the duration of all
start-of-combat skills.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.desc:
Gain a flat increase to Energy
Regen for 8 seconds after killing
an enemy.

analysis.name: Analysis
analysis.desc:
Gain Accuracy during the first 4
 seconds of combat.

the_furious.name: Skill Modifier: The Furious
the_furious.desc:
Gain  15 Piercing for the duration
of The Fast.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

recuperation.name: Recuperation
recuperation.desc: Gain increased healing from all sources while out of combat.

adroitness.name: Adroitness
adroitness.desc:
You gain additional dodge for the
first 4 seconds of combat.

scoundrel.name: Scoundrel
scoundrel.desc:
When a player dies within 15
blocks, gain a chance to drop out
of combat. (1/5th chance for
monsters).

invigorating_presence.name: Skill Modifier: Invigorating Presence
invigorating_presence.desc:
Grant allies within a 25 block
radius with +15% DPS upon The Fast
activation (Does not stack).

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

berserk.name: Active: Berserk
berserk.desc:
Gain 40% more health as a shield,
which decreases by 10% per second
until you are back at your
starting health. Additionally, you
cannot regenerate health while
your shield is active,

Cooldown: 55 Seconds
Duration: 10 Seconds
Cost: 35 Mana

This skill can be activated after unlock
by pressing your swap key. (F by
default)

axe_mastery.name: Axe Mastery
axe_mastery.desc:
Gain an additional chance to
execute while wielding an axe.

fiery_fury.name: Fiery Fury
fiery_fury.desc:
Gain Fire damage, multiplied by 2
^ weapon tier.

shattering_steel.name: Shattering Steel
shattering_steel.desc:
Gain an additional chance to
shatter when you have higher armor
than the target you are hitting.

body_slam.name: Skill Modifier: Body Slam
body_slam.desc:
At the end of your dash, knock
back enemies within 3 blocks into the
air. For each enemy affected, gain
5 armor for 3 seconds. (Max 25
armor)

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

devour.name: Devour
devour.desc:
Gain a chance to refill 5% of your
maximum health and hunger on kill.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.desc:
Gain an additional chance to
critically strike targets under
30% health.

immovable_object.name: Immovable Object
immovable_object.desc:
Gain a chance to push enemies back
when you Block their melee attack.

shake_it_off.name: Shake It Off
shake_it_off.desc:
Your attacks have a chance to free
you from all negative potion
effects.

relentless_pursuit.name: Relentless Pursuit
relentless_pursuit.desc:
You have a chance to gain 15%
movement speed for 5 seconds upon
being hit.

rage.name: Rage
rage.desc:
You have a chance to gain 5 energy
upon being hit.

iron_core.name: Skill Modifier: Iron Core
iron_core.desc:
While Berserk is active, take 15%
less damage.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.desc:
Every second in combat, gain 1%
additional Healing, up to a
maximum.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.desc:
Every second in combat, gain 1
additional armor, up to a maximum.

champion.name: Champion
champion.desc:
Every second in combat, gain 2%
increased armor, up to a maximum.

ragnarok.name: Skill Modifier: Ragnarok
ragnarok.desc:
Gain 15% Block and 15% Energy
Recovery during Berserk.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

sustainability.name: Sustainability
sustainability.desc:
Gain a chance for your weapon to
not lose durability.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.desc: Gain a flat amount of block.

unstoppable_force.name: Unstoppable Force
unstoppable_force.desc:
Every second in combat, gain 2%
increased armor, up to a maximum.

madman.name: Madman
madman.desc: Missing a swing costs less energy.

weathered_warrior.name: Weathered Warrior
weathered_warrior.desc:
Gain a flat amount of elemental 
resistance.

tough_skin.name: Tough Skin
tough_skin.desc:
Adds a percentage of your Elemental
Resistance as extra Armor, up to a
maximum of 15.

deadly_blows.name: Skill Modifier: Deadly Blows
deadly_blows.desc:
Gain 12% Critical Strike chance
during Berserk.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

overwhelming_odds.name: Overwhelming Odds
overwhelming_odds.desc:
For each enemy nearby (Max 5), gain
increased cooldown recovery.

blood_drinker.name: Blood Drinker
blood_drinker.desc:
Once every second when hitting an
enemy, recover a percentage of
your current health.

vampyric.name: Vampyric
vampyric.desc:
Your life stealing effects are
scaled by a percentage.

bloodthirsty.name: Skill Modifier: Bloodthirsty
bloodthirsty.desc:
For 10 seconds after Berserk ends,
gain 12% Life Steal.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

divine_protection.name: Active: Divine Protection
divine_protection.desc:
Gain a shield for 15% of your
maximum health for 10 seconds.
Damage that destroys the shield
does not overflow to yourhealth.

Cooldown: 60 Seconds
Duration: 10 Seconds
Cost: 35 Mana

This skill can be activated after unlock
by pressing your swap key. (F by
default)

mace_mastery.name: Mace Mastery
mace_mastery.desc:
Gain an additional chance to
crush while wielding an axe.

holy_strikes.name: Holy Strikes
holy_strikes.desc:
Gain Pure damage, multiplied by 2
^ weapon tier.

holy_blessing.name: Holy Blessing
holy_blessing.desc: Healing you receive has a chance to be doubled

holy_march.name: Skill Modifier: Holy March
holy_march.desc:
Upon dashing, heal your lowest %HP
ally within 16 blocks for 4% of
their maximum health.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

exorcism.name: Exorcism
exorcism.desc:
Your damage to monsters is
increased by a percentage.

attunement.name: Attunement
attunement.desc:
Gain a flat amount of elemental
resistance

sanctified.name: Sanctified
sanctified.desc:
Your Divine Protection shield's
health has a percentage more
health.

guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
guardian_angel.desc:
Your lowest health ally in a party
of 4+ within 25 blocks gains
additional block.

defender.name: Defender
defender.desc:
Upon blocking an attack, gain a
flat amount of armor for 1 second.

undying_will.name: Skill Modifier: Undying Will
undying_will.desc:
You are immune to slowness. If your
shield is broken, knock back and
damage enemies in a 8 block radius
for 30% of the shield's starting
health.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

strength_in_numbers.name: Strength in Numbers
strength_in_numbers.desc:
Increase your health by a
percentage for each ally in a 25
block radius, up to a maximum of 4
allies.

crushing_blows.name: Crushing Blows
crushing_blows.desc:
Crushing has a chance to give
Slowness 1 for 3 seconds.

zeal_aura.name: Zeal Aura
zeal_aura.desc:
The energy of allies in a 25 block
radius is increased by a flat
value. (Does not stack)

sanctity.name: Sanctity
sanctity.desc:
Reduce your Divine Protection
cooldown by a percentage.

rejuvenation.name: Skill Modifier: Rejuvenation
rejuvenation.desc:
Heal yourself and your allies by 1%
of your max health per second and
slow your enemies during Divine
Protection.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc:
Your damage to players is increased
by a percentage.

bastion.name: Bastion
bastion.desc:
If you have more max health than
your attacker, youu have a flat
increased chance to block their
attack.

cleansing_aura.name: Cleansing Aura
cleansing_aura.desc:
A percentage of your Pure damage
acts as healing for yourself and
allies within 25 blocks. (1 second
cooldown)

holy_wrath.name: Holy Wrath
holy_wrath.desc:
Deal a percentage increased Pure
damage.

consecration.name: Skill Modifier: Consecration
consecration.desc:
Your Pure damage is increased by
25% during Divine Protection.

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.

purity.name: Purity
purity.desc:
A portion of your elemental damage
is converted to Pure damage.

faith.name: Faith
faith.desc:
Your maximum health is increased by
a percentage.

devotion_aura.name: Devotion Aura
devotion_aura.desc:
You and allies in a 25 block radius
are granted additional block.
(Does not stack)

quick_recovery.name: Quick Recovery
quick_recovery.desc: Gain a flat amount of HP recovery.

the_phalanx.name: Skill Modifier: The Phalanx
the_phalanx.desc:
Allies within 15 blocks gain 10%
Damage Reduction during Divine
Protection. (Does not stack)

Skill modifiers change the functionality
of your active ability.
